name: Basement Dweller
description:
Basement Dweller is an accompanying RPG game to an upcoming audio drama.

It follows Wade, a confused young man who wakes up dazed after another night of drinking, only to find that he can't leave. To make matters worse, he is not alone.

Haunted by the echoing whispers of his hazy past but unable to remember any of it, will he be able to piece together his shattered memories and make it out alive?
